UnityColor (R) LED Light Control System Selected light drains circa %light_power% A
Selected power supply handles: %psu_current% A

Decrease the light intensity or set the power of PSU to higher on the Recertification Page. Are you sure you wish to reset the lamp definitions to its factory settings?

You will lose any custom lamp definitions and all lamp counters will be reset to 0! Also locally stored cache files will be deleted. This means the app will revert to as if it was installed on the phone for the first time.

The application will restart Please choose the lamp and the delay below What do you want to do with this sequence step? ListViewDemo

Long press to edit or remove step.
